Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolated bacterial colonies (Citrobacter freundii, Enterobacter cloacae, Escherichia coli, Klebsiella oxytoca, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Citrobacter koseri, Enterobacter aerogenes, Serratia marcescens)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 Gram Negative Tigecycline susceptibility reagent cards for automated testing of gram-negative bacteria using VITEK 2 systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of specified gram-negative bacteria using VITEK 2 systems as a laboratory aid in determining in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents.
